channel.title: Postdoc on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Postdoc on David John Baker

item.title: A short reflection after writing my first, little Stan model
item.description: During my postdoc, I’ve resolved to better understand Bayesian statistics. This started a few years ago, when I organized a group of colleagues to painstakingly make our way through Statistical Rethinking.

item.title: Goldsmiths x Soundout Postdoc
item.description: Today’s an exciting day as I signed a contract for my next year-ish of employment.
